body_html:
Hey @ArushiSinghal & @cesswairimu 👋

Sorry it took me so long to get back to you 🙈

This was indeed a feature which was originally planned for the community page. At least filtering by country was already worked on in this PR by our lovely students from last year.

There is also an existing open issue on this topic. I'll therefore close this one, so that we don't end up with the same information in various places.

If you'd like to work on implementing the filter for location, maybe quickly read over the existing communication in #594 first and ping me there if you need any more information or things are still unclear.
But we're of course happy about a PR for this 🎉

This was indeed a feature which was originally planned for the community page. At least filtering by country was already worked on in this PR by our lovely students from last year.
There is also an existing open issue on this topic. I'll therefore close this one, so that we don't end up with the same information in various places.
If you'd like to work on implementing the filter for location, maybe quickly read over the existing communication in #594 first and ping me there if you need any more information or things are still unclear.
But we're of course happy about a PR for this 🎉
body:
Hey @ArushiSinghal & @cesswairimu 👋 

Sorry it took me so long to get back to you 🙈 

This was indeed a feature which was originally planned for the community page. At least filtering by `country` was already worked on in [this PR](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/849) by our lovely students from last year.

There is also [an existing open issue](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/594) on this topic. I'll therefore close this one, so that we don't end up with the same information in various places.

If you'd like to work on implementing the filter for `location`, maybe quickly read over the existing communication in https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/594 first and ping me there if you need any more information or things are still unclear.
But we're of course happy about a PR for this 🎉
